summary: The Broadcast Varied Ownership Incentives for Community Expanded Service Act (Broadcast VOICES Act) aims to increase diversity in the broadcasting industry. It directs the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) to take actions, including issuing reports to Congress on ownership diversity and establishing a tax certificate program for broadcast station transactions that promote ownership by socially disadvantaged individuals. The bill also provides tax breaks for contributions related to training socially disadvantaged individuals in broadcast management.
